rooms.name: Comfort Double Room
rooms.description: Free Toiletries Shower Safe Deposit Box Toilet Towels Bed linen Socket close to bed Hypoallergenic Desk Sitting Area TV Slipper Heating Hair dryer Extra Long Beds (> 2 meters) Carpeted Floor Electric Kettle Cable Channels Wake Up Service Wardrobe or closet Upper floors can be accessed by elevator.
